{{cpp/thread/future/title|share}}
{{cpp/thread/future/navbar}}
{{ddcl|note={{mark since c++11}}|
std::shared_future&lt;T&gt; share() noexcept;
}}

Transfers the shared state of {{c|*this}}, if any, to a {{lc|std::shared_future}} object. Multiple {{lc|std::shared_future}} objects may reference the same shared state, which is not possible with {{lc|std::future}}.

After calling {{tt|share}} on a {{lc|std::future}}, [[cpp/thread/future/valid|{{c|valid()}}]] {{c| {{==}} false}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
A {{lc|std::shared_future}} object containing the shared state previously held by {{c|*this}}, if any, constructed as if by {{c|std::shared_future&lt;T&gt;(std::move(*this))}}.
